skill.description: 国际象棋引擎分析工具，提供最佳走法推荐、局面评估和多种走法选择分析。支持FEN字符串直接输入分析。

skill.author: CK991357

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill definition with no executable code. This SKILL.md provides instructions for AI assistants to act as chess tutors. No filesystem access, network calls, or command execution. Contains only text-based guidance for chess analysis.

content.value_statement: Chess players need expert move recommendations and position analysis to improve their game. This skill connects AI assistants to Stockfish engine for instant best move suggestions, multi-option analysis, and professional-grade position evaluation.
actual_capabilities: Get best move recommendations for any chess position
Generate multiple top move options with trade-off analysis
Evaluate position advantage (centipawn score or mate)
Convert UCI move notation to SAN format for teaching
Auto-detect FEN strings and user intent
limitations: Requires valid FEN string input for position analysis
Does not validate chess rules or legality of moves
Does not play games or maintain game state
No image recognition for board screenshots

use_cases.title: Learn from AI coaching
use_cases.description: Receive step-by-step move explanations and strategic guidance to understand why certain moves are best

use_cases.title: Deepen your tactics
use_cases.description: Analyze complex positions and compare multiple candidate moves to understand strategic trade-offs

use_cases.title: Create chess content
use_cases.description: Generate professional analysis and explanations for educational materials or game reviews

prompt_templates.title: Basic position analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 0 1 最佳走法是什么？

prompt_templates.title: Compare multiple moves
prompt_templates.prompt: r1bqkbnr/pp1ppppp/2n5/2p5/4P3/5N2/PPPP1PPP/RNBQKB1R w KQkq - 2 3 帮我分析前三步好走法

prompt_templates.title: Position evaluation
prompt_templates.prompt: r1bqkbnr/pp1ppppp/2n5/2p5/4P3/5N2/PPPP1PPP/RNBQKB1R w KQkq - 2 3 现在谁有优势？局面评估如何？

prompt_templates.title: Strategic explanation
prompt_templates.prompt: r1bqkbnr/pp1ppppp/2n5/2p5/4P3/5N2/PPPP1PPP/RNBQKB1R w KQkq - 2 3 最佳走法是什么？请解释这步棋的战略意图

output_examples.input: rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 0 1 最佳走法是什么？
output: 战略分析：这步棋为f2兵开辟进攻路线，同时保护e4中心兵，是开局的标准招法之一

best_practices: Always provide valid FEN strings to ensure accurate position analysis
Ask for move explanations to understand strategic reasoning behind recommendations
Request multiple options when exploring complex positions to compare trade-offs
anti_patterns: Asking for moves without providing the current board position (FEN required)
Blindly playing AI suggestions without understanding the strategic reasoning
Expecting the AI to play a complete game from start to finish

faq.question: Which AI platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code through their MCP or tool calling interface.

faq.question: What is a FEN string and where do I get one?
faq.answer: FEN is a standard notation describing a chess position. Chess apps, engines, and websites can export FEN strings.

faq.question: Does the AI store my game data?
faq.answer: No. This is a pure analysis skill. No game positions or personal data is stored or transmitted externally.

faq.question: Can it analyze positions in Chinese?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill supports both Chinese and English instructions for moves, evaluation, and explanations.

faq.question: What analysis depth can it provide?
faq.answer: The Stockfish engine provides move quality assessment, position scores in centipawns, and mate-in-N calculations.

faq.question: How is this different from a chess app?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on teaching and explaining moves. It transforms engine output into human-readable strategic guidance.
